name: National Alliance of Mental Illness - San Francisco (NAMI)
description: The National Alliance on Mental Illness in San Francisco (NAMI SF) is a non-profit organization that helps the community's voice on mental illness through support, education, and advocacy. NAMI is the nation’s largest grassroots organization dedicated to improving the lives of individuals living with a mental health condition and their families. With organizations and affiliates in every state, NAMI effectively provides advocacy, support, and education for millions of Americans.
